mapper.select: select * from work_list order by wrk_lst_id asc

SELECT DISTINCT A.WRK_ID , A.USER_EMAIL , C.WRK_LST_NM , C.PRJ_ID , B.USER_NM , D.PRJ_NM , A.WRK_LST_ID , A.WRK_RV_ID , A.WRK_PR_ID , A.WRK_NM , A.WRK_DT , A.WRK_GRADE , A.WRK_COLOR_CD , A.WRK_START_DT , A.WRK_END_DT , A.WRK_CMP_DT , A.WRK_CMP_FL , A.WRK_DEL_FL FROM WORK A, USERS B, WORK_LIST C, PROJECT D WHERE A.WRK_ID = #{WRK_ID} AND A.USER_EMAIL = B.USER_EMAIL AND A.WRK_LST_ID = C.WRK_LST_ID AND C.PRJ_ID = D.PRJ_ID AND A.WRK_START_DT is not null AND A.WRK_END_DT is not null
mapper.insert: insert into work values ( WRK_SEQ.nextVal, #{wrk_lst_id}, '', WRK_SEQ.nextVal, #{user_email}, #{wrk_nm}, sysdate, 'C', #{wrk_color_cd}, #{wrk_start_dt}, #{wrk_end_dt}, '', 'N', 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.WRK_ID , A.USER_EMAIL , C.WRK_LST_NM , C.PRJ_ID , B.USER_NM , D.PRJ_NM , A.WRK_LST_ID , A.WRK_RV_ID , A.WRK_PR_ID , A.WRK_NM , A.WRK_DT , A.WRK_GRADE , A.WRK_COLOR_CD , A.WRK_START_DT , A.WRK_END_DT , A.WRK_CMP_DT , A.WRK_CMP_FL , A.WRK_DEL_FL FROM WORK A, USERS B, WORK_LIST C, PROJECT D WHERE D.prj_id = #{prj_id} AND A.USER_EMAIL = B.USER_EMAIL AND A.WRK_LST_ID = C.WRK_LST_ID AND C.PRJ_ID = D.PRJ_ID AND A.WRK_START_DT is not null AND A.WRK_END_DT is not null

select distinct b.USER_EMAIL, c.user_nm, b.PRJ_MEM_LV 레벨, b.PRJ_MEM_NIK 닉네임, b.PRJ_OWN_FL from project a, PROJECT_MEM b , users c where a.prj_id = #{prj_id} and a.prj_id = b.prj_id and b.user_email = c.user_email
mapper.update: update work set wrk_lst_id = #{wrk_lst_id}, wrk_nm = #{wrk_nm}, wrk_color_cd = #{wrk_color_cd}, wrk_start_dt = #{wrk_start_dt}, wrk_end_dt = #{wrk_end_dt} where wrk_id = #{wrk_id}
